Name: New Year's Day
Description: Celebrated on January 1st, New Year's Day marks the beginning of the new year. It's a day for reflection, celebration, and setting new goals.
PlacesToVisit: Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands, Clarke Quay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Chinese New Year
Description: Chinese New Year, also known as Lunar New Year, is a 15-day festival that celebrates the beginning of a new year on the traditional Chinese calendar. It's a time for family reunions, feasting, and various cultural activities.
PlacesToVisit: Chinatown, Gardens by the Bay, Clarke Quay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Hari Raya Puasa
Description: Hari Raya Puasa, also known as Eid al-Fitr, marks the end of Ramadan, the Islamic holy month of fasting. It's a time for celebration, feasting, and giving thanks.
PlacesToVisit: Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands, Clarke Quay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Good Friday
Description: Good Friday is a Christian holiday commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary. It's a day of mourning and reflection for many Christians.
PlacesToVisit: St. Andrew's Cathedral, Singapore Botanic Gardens
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Labour Day
Description: Labour Day, also known as International Workers' Day, is a celebration of the contributions of workers and the labor movement. It's a day for parades, demonstrations, and other events honoring workers.
PlacesToVisit: Marina Bay Sands, Clarke Quay, Gardens by the Bay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Vesak Day
Description: Vesak Day is a Buddhist holiday that commemorates the birth, enlightenment, and death of Buddha. It's a day for reflection, meditation, and acts of kindness.
PlacesToVisit: Buddha Tooth Relic Temple, Singapore Botanic Gardens
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Hari Raya Haji
Description: Hari Raya Haji, also known as Eid al-Adha, is a Muslim holiday that commemorates the willingness of Ibrahim (Abraham) to sacrifice his son as an act of obedience to God. It's a time for prayer, feasting, and charity.
PlacesToVisit: Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands, Clarke Quay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: National Day
Description: National Day is a public holiday in Singapore that celebrates the country's independence from Malaysia on August 9, 1965. It's a day for patriotic celebrations, including parades, fireworks, and other events.
PlacesToVisit: Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Clarke Quay
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Deepavali
Description: Deepavali, also known as Diwali, is a Hindu festival of lights that celebrates the victory of light over darkness, good over evil, and knowledge over ignorance. It's a time for family gatherings, feasting, and lighting lamps.
PlacesToVisit: Sri Mariamman Temple, Little India, Singapore Botanic Gardens
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers

Name: Christmas Day
Description: Christmas Day is a Christian holiday celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ. It's a day for family gatherings, feasting, and gift-giving.
PlacesToVisit: Clarke Quay, Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands
WeatherCondition: Typically warm and humid with occasional rain showers
